credit_cards.name: Visa Platinum

credit_cards.name: Mastercard Standard
credit_cards.description: Mastercard Standard is an entry-level card that offers essential benefits and global acceptance.
benefits: Global acceptance at millions of locations
Zero liability protection against unauthorized purchases

credit_cards.name: Mastercard Gold
credit_cards.description: Mastercard Gold offers more benefits and higher spending limits than the Standard version.

credit_cards.name: Mastercard Platinum
credit_cards.description: Mastercard Platinum offers enhanced security, exclusive offers, and travel-related benefits.

credit_cards.name: Amex Blue
credit_cards.description: Amex Blue is a modern entry-level American Express card offering strong rewards for everyday spending.
benefits: Cash back or Membership Rewards points
Exclusive Amex Offers for shopping, dining, and travel

credit_cards.name: Amex Gold
credit_cards.description: Amex Gold is a premium rewards card tailored for foodies and travelers.
benefits: High points earnings on restaurants and supermarkets
Up to $120 in dining credits annually

credit_cards.name: Amex Platinum
credit_cards.description: Amex Platinum is a top-tier card with luxury travel benefits and concierge services.
benefits: Access to airport lounges worldwide (Priority Pass, Centurion, Delta Sky Clubs)
Annual travel credits and hotel elite status
Concierge service and exclusive event access
Premium travel insurance and purchase protection
